description: At Outdoor Research, they’ve been building for protection, preparedness and strength since 1981. The Gore-Tex 2L Mt. Baker Storm Kit continues this tradition. It was inspired by the classic Mt Baker Mitt, and built in partnership with an athlete team and core users to endure Mt Baker Ski Area's famously wet and stormy weather
name: Outdoor Research Mt Baker Storm Jacket - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Gore-Tex 2L 100% Nylon 70D Plain Weave
bluesign® approved Gore-Tex 2L 100% Nylon 150D Plain Weave
